attributes.action: Get Long Term Unemployed Off Benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Restrict the amount of time for being on Job Seekers Allowance to one year. Set up training programmes to make it easier for people to become qualified at a particular trade. Stop employers from asking for qualified people only and make them train more people in the workplace.
Bring in more apprenticeship style jobs to give everyone a fairer chance at becoming employed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
